summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5752 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 2, Ballard Water-Front Addition, being the alley between 32nd Avenue Northwest and 33rd Avenue Northwest from West 75th Street to West 77th Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 75862, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
